job.title: Data Scientist (Machine Learning) - Evernorth (Work from home)
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Financial Services,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: Cignas Global Data amp Analytics organization offers solutions that provide actionable insights to internal and external business partners and customers to reduce health costs improve outcomes and measure and forecast business performancebrbrstrongExcited to grow your careerbrbrstrongOur people make all the difference in our success as influencers of change in the healthcare industry Working for our organization means having a direct impact on Cignas ability to drive the future of healthcare Join our team and engage in meaningful work that makes a difference to improve the health wellbeing and peace of mind of those we servebrbrDo you have a passion for machine learning  artificial intelligence Are you excited about using your skills to help individuals improve their health Our Data Science roles are an opportunity to apply advanced Data Science DS Artificial Intelligence AI and Machine Learning ML to produce solutions that reduce customer health costs affordability quality gaps in care reduce operational expenses and optimize business processes Using AI tools DS platforms ML libraries and optimization tools we leverage internal external online and offline data sources comprising clinical provider amp Rx data and behavioralattitudinal data Our Data Science team engages in work that has a direct impact on our customers and providersbrbrstronguRole SummarybrbrustrongYour work will require deep acquaintance with Cignas data seeking to find ways to deliver value through advanced feature engineering From your models you will deliver actionable insights that can be incorporated into existing Cigna wellness products as well as new programs In addition to collaborating with Data Science Management to establish strategic priorities you will work closely with Data amp Engineering to deliver code that is robust and ready to scalebrbrThe ideal candidate for this role will have strong coding skills preferably in Python a passion for creating technology to improve health care and an attitude of creativity and continual learningbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliCreate models using ML  AI techniques to predict risk and identify actionable insightsliliDeliver clean reusable and scalable codeliliWork closely with Data amp Engineering to deploy modelsliliProvide thought leadership on latest analytic techniques technologies and methodsbrliulstronguQualificationsbrustrongulliMSPhD in Computer Science Math Statistics or in any technical field that provides a solid basis for analytics or equivalent work experienceliliExcellent understandingexperience with leading ML  AI methods XGBoost deep learning reinforcement learning optimizationlili3 years experience with Python and its data science libraries such as Scikitlearn Pandas Numpy and KerasliliExcellent communication skillsbrliulThis position is not eligible to be performed in ColoradobrbrstronguAbout EvernorthbrbrustrongEvernorth Cigna Corporations health services segment exists to elevate health for all Were building on our legacy and redefining health care as we know it Unbiased in how we think we create without limitation We partner without constraints deliver value differently and act in the interest of humanity Solving across silos closing gaps in care and empowering clients customers and people everywhere to move
